      • askOpenInCurrentWindow

        public static int askOpenInCurrentWindow(Component parent,
                                         String title)
        Asks the user how to open a project: In the current window or a new window
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        title - window title
        Returns:
        JOptionPane.YES_OPTION to open in this window; JOptionPane.NO_OPTION to open in a new window; JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION to cancel.

        Parameters:
